EmulatorPlatform.Platform: Nintendo Super Nintendo Entertainment System (Translated En)
SNK Neo Geo Pocket Color (Translated En)

Emulator.Title: RetroArch
Emulator.PauseAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for pausing RetroArch
Emulator.ResumeAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for resuming RetroArch
Emulator.ExitAutoHotkeyScript: ; No custom exit script is necessary for RetroArch ; since it already uses the Escape key by default

Emulator.Title: Sega Model 2 Emulator
Emulator.PauseAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for pausing Sega Model 2 Emulator
Emulator.ResumeAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for resuming Sega Model 2 Emulator
Emulator.SwapDiscsAutoHotkeyScript: ; Swapping discs is not relevant for Sega Model 2 Emulator
Emulator.ExitAutoHotkeyScript: ; No custom exit script is necessary for Sega Model 2 Emulator ; since it is triggered by the default Running AutoHotkey script

Emulator.Title: RPCS3
Emulator.AutoHotkeyScript:
; See https://wiki.rpcs3.net/index.php?title=Help:Keyboard_Shortcuts for a list of rpcs3 shortcut
$Esc:: { WinClose, ahk_exe rpcs3.exe }
; Save State $5::^s
; Load State $6::^r
; Screenshot $N::F12
; Disable Framelimiter $F2::^F10
; Pause $F3::^P

Emulator.Title: MAME 0.250
Emulator.PauseAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for pausing MAME
Emulator.ResumeAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for resuming MAME
Emulator.SwapDiscsAutoHotkeyScript: ; Swapping discs is not relevant for MAME
Emulator.ExitAutoHotkeyScript: ; No custom exit script is necessary for MAME ; since it already uses the Escape key by default

Emulator.Title: Demul
Emulator.PauseAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for pausing Demul
Emulator.ResetAutoHotkeyScript: ; Reset Game is not available in Demul
Emulator.ExitAutoHotkeyScript: ; No custom exit script is necessary for Demul ; since it already uses the Escape key by default

Emulator.Title: Dolphin
Emulator.PauseAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for pausing Dolphin
Emulator.ResumeAutoHotkeyScript: ; No script is required for resuming Dolphin
Emulator.ExitAutoHotkeyScript: ; No custom exit script is necessary for Dolphin ; since it already uses the Escape key by default

Emulator.Title: Play
XM-7
Emulator.AutoHotkeyScript:
Up::Numpad8 Down::Numpad2 Left::Numpad4 Right::Numpad6
4::F12 ; Reset
1::Enter
Escape:: Process, Close, XM7dash.exe ExitApp
